title: Chamonix
name: Cable cars to Italy
content: Don't miss the exhilirating 5 km Vallée Blanche cable car ride over snow capped mountains from Aiguille du Midi in France to Helbronner in Italy. You will get to the other side of the Mont Blanc massif, crossing through a region of high alpine glaciers and mountains over 4000m high. The ride takes around half and hour. The route almost exactly the Mont Blanc tunnel, a few kilometers below.
